entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
